item.title: Writing Essays
item.description: The different between an educated person and an un-educated person doing a manual job is that the educated person writes his findings down so that the future educated men can read and learn from his knowledge. We have to keep in mind that History repeats itself and Everyone has a History. Understanding When searching for how to improve my writing, I came across an essay by Paul Graham in which he writes.
